Text: Cherries are a subgroup of plants in the Rose family. Historically known as the "Tokyo Cherry" or "Japanese Blossom", I have never seen one in real life, but I have seen their photos in books.
That person is the first human to make me feel special, to make me want to... touch—I don't know if these thoughts should exist.
Please look forward to my performance.
Humans fall ill without consistent nutritional intake. Please strive for a healthy diet, Commandant.
Gray Raven will remain on standby at HQ until we receive your orders.
Lucia at your service.
Commandant. Should we do something if you're free...?
Humans can experience fatigue, unlike Constructs. Make sure you get enough rest.
Are human relationships anything like ours?
Just staying like this is fine too. Just the two of us...
Are you busy, Commandant?
I was thinking about you when you were away.
The warrior's blade is not bound by the scabbard but by the soul of its wielder. Warriors may be a thing in the past, but their spirit never dies...
Gray Raven leader, Lucia. Nice to meet you, Commandant.
I am your blade. Do not hesitate to use me.
Good to see you again, Commandant.
Hmm... We've been seeing a lot of each other lately.
I feel like something's changing in my M.I.N.D...
I'm content right now.
I hold no fear for the future as long as you're here.
Nose to the grindstone, Commandant.
Don't worry. l won't cause you trouble.
The battlefield will always be my home.
Trouble sleeping? May as well keep fighting then.
You put a brave face on things far more than me, don't you?
...You're getting a bit too close.
Only because it's you.
This feeling... It has a power that could encompass everything.
Don't worry. I'll protect you.
You give me the courage to face the darkness.
My memory is very short. I don't know when I'll be rebooted, or even if I'll remember you.
Don't worry about us. It is you who gives us strength.
I'll keep trying.
Please get some rest. I'll help Lucia protect the base.
If you've got any questions about HQ, please feel free to ask me.
Lee has provided me with stats for your last battle. Please take a look.
I may not fight as well as the others, but I'll always try my best!
Sorry for troubling you again today. But if I can help at all, it would be my pleasure.
Lucia is a powerful Construct, and you... are a powerful human.
I wonder what it was like when humans still roamed the Earth?
Have you been staying up late reading again? I already warned you about that.
Commandant... My name is Liv... I'll try to be of help.
Don't worry, I'm here. I may not be able to hold my own, but I'll try my best to do so.
I might not be as good as Lucia, but I'll try to catch up.
Lee keeps looking over at me... Have I done something wrong...?
There's a lot of things about you that I'd like to study closer.
Welcome back! Let's all do our best today.
I find your voice very reassuring.
I-if it's possible, I'd love to watch the sunset and sunrise with you one day.
If it's you, I think I don't mind being a bit closer.
I wonder what it was like when humans still roamed the Earth?
A new day is dawning, Commandant.
Would today's operation planning require my help?
I am no longer alive. What fear does death hold for me?
I could never hate you.
Do not fear to be in the darkness, for I shall lead you forward.
As long as you're here, I am content.
Have you run into trouble?
(I like you...)
I can never know too much about you.
Life is nothing but a series of cycles.
Humans want to know the future but cannot predict it. Sometimes I wonder if Constructs were made to satisfy the human need for a future.
So you're the Commandant, huh... Just don't do anything stupid.
I'm not just your average data jockey. I can fight as well.
Good choice.
Apparently, humans without enough rest at night have a higher rate of hair loss.
Rest is optional for Constructs.
Don't worry too much about us. You're much more important.
I can't complain. You're easier to deal with than the last Commandant.
Okay, okay. "We're getting along." I get it.
Get some rest, or you won't last 'til the afternoon operations.
Nothing.
Not bad. I feel like I'll grow stronger.
Idle hands are the devil's workshop, Commandant.
I ran some tests on the Corrupted yesterday. I'll show you later.
Aren't these... tricks what you perform on humans? Why are you using it all on me...?
I might go a bit easier on you if you manage to survive the next battle.
Staying in this squad was the best decision I've ever made.
There you are! Let us begin by analyzing those Corrupted samples we collected yesterday.
You look like you can handle yourself in a fight.
...What are you looking at?
Strategy and tactics are two different things... Not that you'd understand.
If you find yourself with a lot of spare time, you should maybe do some brain exercises.
Commandants shouldn't just be sitting around all day, right?
Your work is tiring, Commandant. Let me know if you don't feel well.
Tell me if you run into any trouble. Don't just keep it all in yourself.
I didn't say I dislike it.
So we're getting to know each other, huh.
I remember everything you say. Orders, and everything else.
Don't worry. I'll protect you.
Having no emotions is good. That way you will never betray someone, nor experience betrayal.
I will never betray.
Might is needed to fulfill your wishes.
God bless...
Faith? It all came naturally, please don't mind me.
I trust you completely, Commandant.
Practice makes perfect. The same goes for all skills.
I do my duty, because that's what I believe in.
No more goofing off when we're together, okay?
I'm given a more mature disposition than the other girls on the team... What do you think of it, Commandant...?
I believe in you, Commandant.
I hope we can fight together, at the very least.
Preparations are complete. You can begin working whenever you like.
I will follow all your commands.
Indeed, we get along quite well.
You should rest if you're tired, but please don't slack off during work.
I'm a believer, but my faith isn't blind—that's why I protect you.
Constructs can't truly have faith? Or are you trying to be my target of worship?
The power of faith cannot be denied—just like the power you give me.
Because of you, battle now has meaning for me.
I don't have this concept of equivalent exchange in my data banks... If it's true, then should I feel the same way about you?
I've been studying how humans used to communicate... Well, you've got my attention, Commandant! Hmm... this doesn't seem to be working...
Witness Nanami's grand entrance! I'm the strongest!
What's it like to lose your hair? Nanami wants to try!
If you say so, then maaaaybe I'll remove a few more of my power limiters.
The more time I spend with you, the more I feel like I'm becoming a human...
All enemies are friends of Nanami!
You humans get to eat anything you want! I'm dying to try that strawberry thing one day!
Humans are sooo interesting! I'd like to study you more closely, if you don't mind—
Who knows, maybe one day Nanami will just disappear altogether... So, please try to remember me.
Commandant, you're here! Let's get started!
Commandant, you're not slacking off during work hours, are you?
I've learned so many things in the Gray Raven squad! Nanami loves it!
We go together like peas and carrots!
Humans always say that the unattainable is the most beautiful, do you think so too?
Stop eating in front of Nanami?! It makes me want to eat too...
Weird. My fixation with all things human has become a fixation of all things you.
Are all humans so eager to increase their affection levels?
I think... some emotions have no upper limits!
I'm working hard to meet you face to face one day.
Humans and Constructs are no different. We all realize our goals through battle.
I don't care who's the boss, as long as I get to fight.
I'm stronger than Lucia, right?
Make my schedule already.
...I feel my intellect dropping just by being in this team.
I can handle any weapons. Don't be stingy.
Tired already? Whatever. Go and get some rest. I'll take it from here.
You want to make me sharper? Then let me fight!
I ain't trying to get on your good side! This is just for me and me only!
There you are, finally! Next time I'm not hanging around.
I'm only here wasting time with you because of mission requirements.
Will I ever find something in my life that's more important than battling?
Well... You don't need to be this nice to me.
Wouldn't your time be better spent killing Corrupted?
I'm only here because you said so... It's not like I want to be here...
You want a taste of my cannon?!
Why do I hate Lucia? Because she's strong... I mean, nothing!
I should be the one beside you, not Lucia!
I-I'll try to pay you just a little bit more attention...
I've never felt... so close to a human before...
Is every team you lead this stupid?
Hm, let's see if this lets me fight better.
Hello? Babylonia to Commandant, are you there?
You're just like everyone else, toiling through the morning.
We're only doing this so we can fight better, yeah?
Are you sucking up to me?
I doubt I'll ever get this close... to anyone ever again...
Something more important than battle...? Y-you'll have to give me a hint!
I will become stronger and earn my place by your side.
I wonder, is there a place for me in your heart?
Nanami says humans would describe me as a "hot-blooded idiot". Is that true?
I'm Kamui. Good to meet you, Commandant!
I do have other interests, but fighting is what we do. Lucia's the same too, right?
Ha—there you are! Come on, let's get rumblin'!
What does remembrance feels like? I don't have such a function, so I don't know...
Humans dream. Do you ever dream of me?
Haha, oh nothing. Just smiling at you.
The very thought of fighting next to you sends energy coursing through my body.
Commandant! When are you going to take me on another mission—?!
Let's do our best in the future too!
You're full of beans today!
Have you eaten? You better. There's nothing to eat here if you get the munchies later.
You're the strangest Commandant I've ever seen... not that I'm complaining, haha!
Have I changed a lot? I'd change anything, as long as it's for you.
What am I going to do once the world is saved? Who cares, as long as we're together!
I'm just as good as Lee or Watanabe! I can be trusted with important missions too!
Have you eaten? You better. There's nothing to eat here if you get the munchies later.
Go and rest. I'm not going anywhere.
It's hard to describe how I feel, but I do know I feel happy.
You're the one who gives me the strength to keep moving forward.
There is no eternal trust nor eternal betrayal. They only last for how deep they run.
I don't particularly like humans... but for the moment we share the same objective.
I'll give it everything I've got.
You still haven't finalized the operation plans? Don't put it off much longer.
I'm not very good with these kinds of atmosphere... We should talk it out.
Weapons are like skills. The more you use them, the better you are at them.
I'll stay here. If anything weird happens, I'll let you know.
The night is dark and long. I know.
You have an immense power that can escape rules.
Fear not. I'll protect you.
Careful planning is the key to success. You should learn this skill.
Whatever. Please yourself.
At least the stars are worth looking at... Assuming there are no clouds.
For the rules I made, naturally, I get to break them.
What's in it for you?
Don't worry yourself too much about HQ. I'll keep an eye on things for you.
Too much paperwork? You seem very busy.
I'm just worried if people might be bullying you...
I must admit, I don't want to wreck what we've got...
I don't trust humans, but I trust you. Your existence is already rule-breaking.
